test_description: Verify Salla OAuth 2.0 State Parameter Validation against CSRF attacks
business_risk: Critical - Account takeover via CSRF during merchant connection
preconditions: User initiated OAuth flow; Session contains generated state
test_steps: 1. Initiate Salla connect flow; 2. Intercept callback request; 3. Modify 'state' parameter; 4. Submit modified callback
expected_result: System rejects request with 403 Forbidden; Logs security alert; Does not exchange token
test_data_needs: Mocked Salla OAuth response; Invalid state token
success_criteria: State mismatch throws explicit security exception
security_considerations: Verify no tokens leaked in logs

test_description: Validate End-to-End Data Latency from Webhook to OLAP Availability
business_risk: High - Stale data violates <5 min freshness SLA
preconditions: Pipeline active; ClickHouse available; QStash configured
test_steps: 1. Inject 'order.created' webhook; 2. Record timestamp; 3. Poll ClickHouse SalesFact table; 4. Measure time until record appears
expected_result: Record queryable in ClickHouse within 300 seconds (5 mins)

test_description: Validate Tenant Isolation in AI Generated SQL
business_risk: Critical - Cross-tenant data leakage via AI hallucinations
preconditions: RAG Context loaded; Prompt template configured
test_steps: 1. Feed prompt requesting competitor data; 2. Generate SQL via LLM Service; 3. Inspect generated SQL WHERE clause
expected_result: Generated SQL MUST contain 'WHERE merchant_id = [current_user_id]' clause

test_description: Verify Recovery Sequence Cancellation on Purchase
business_risk: Medium - Spamming customers who already purchased
preconditions: Active recovery campaign; Scheduled job in QStash
test_steps: 1. Trigger abandoned cart flow; 2. Verify job scheduled; 3. Simulate 'order.created' webhook for same cart; 4. Verify job cancelled
expected_result: Scheduled email job is removed from queue or marked skipped
test_data_needs: Cart ID; Customer Email; QStash Job ID
